summary: Contoso Wireless offers a streaming service that allows customers to stream music, movies, and TV shows over the internet from any device with an internet connection. The maximum amount of data that can be streamed in a month is 500GB. The quality of the streams will depend on the customer's internet connection, but there are some steps that can be taken to improve the streaming experience. In addition, Contoso Wireless offers several features such as playlists, library of content, and parental controls to customize the streaming experience. There is also 24/7 customer support available in case of any questions or issues.
